Young Literati  

Join a group of engaged Angelenos in their 20s, 30s, and 40s who believe in and celebrate the power of public libraries.

Young Literati offers a variety of exclusive Members-only benefits including invitations to cultural events and parties throughout the year featuring LA’s most exciting authors, actors, artists, and academics. Learn more about Young Literati’s Membership levels and our signature events below.

To learn more about Young Literati please contact Jennifer Kondo, Director of Young Literati, at 213.228.7326.

Friend

$250

Join/Renew Now

Gift a Membership
  • ($220 tax deductible)
  • Invitations to Members-only special events throughout the year, including the Young Literati Summer Social
  • Discounts on tickets to the Young Literati Annual Toast
  • Advance electronic notice to ALOUD programs and Young Literati at ALOUD receptions
  • 15% discount at The Library Store
  • Subscription to Library Foundation quarterly newsletter
  • Discounts on ticketed LFLA events
  • Reciprocal Membership to the New York Public Library’s Young Lions
  • Contributor level Membership in the Library Associates

Young Literati Membership – Friend

$250.00

SKU: YL-FRIENDS. Category: Young Literati Membership.

Young Literati Membership – Friend – Gift

$250.00

SKU: YL-FRIENDS-GIFT. Category: Gift Membership.

Give the gift of Membership to your friends, family, colleagues and we'll send directly to your recipient, or mail the gift to you to deliver personally. Members enjoy 12 full months of critically acclaimed programs that bring together today’s brightest thinkers, invitations to special events, discounts, and so much more.
If you'd like to purchase multiple memberships, please contact us directly.

Join/Renew Now

Gift a Membership

All preceding benefits plus:

  • ($420 tax deductible)
  • Two complimentary tickets to an ALOUD offsite program
  • Invitations for two to attend Lost and Found at the Movies and The Writer’s Cut programs
  • Sustainer level Membership in the Library Associates
